document_data.name: Create Darkness
document_data.mainbody: '''''Create darkness''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that extinguished all nonmagical light.
document_data.Effects: This spell could also extinguish light given off from magical sources if the source was unable to resist the spell's magic. A normal light source affected by ''create darkness'' could not be relit for one hour, while magical sources stood a chance of being relit every ten minutes.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This was an uncommon spell used by [[drow]] and other spellcasters of the [[Underdark]].
